description: This source file defines a Spring Boot REST controller 'HelloController' providing basic health and info endpoints, as well as a welcome message and redirect to Swagger UI. It includes annotations for REST endpoints and OpenAPI documentation.

classes.name: HelloController
classes.description: A REST controller providing basic endpoints for greetings, health check, and documentation redirect.

methods.name: hello
methods.description: Returns a welcome message to the user.

methods.name: docs
methods.description: Redirects to Swagger UI documentation page.

methods.name: health
methods.description: Provides a simple health check response.
